

1)
Given
ip=192.0.4.8 
subnet mask=255.255.255.252

11000000.00000000.00000100.000010 00 --> Ip address
11111111.11111111.11111111.111111 00 --> Subnet Mask

11000000.00000000.00000100.000010 00 -->Network Address
11000000.00000000.00000100.000010 11 -->Broadcast Address

no of avaliable address = 2^2 -2 = 4-2 = 2

range

192.0.4.8 - 192.0.4.11

2)
Given
ip : 10.1.4.5 
subnet mask: 255.255.254.0

00001010.00000001.00000100.00000101 --->Ip address
11111111.11111111.11111111.11111110 --->subnet mask

00001010.00000001.00000100.0000010 0 -->Network Address
00001010.00000001.00000100.0000010 1 -->Broadcast Address

no of avaliable address = 2^1 -2 = 2-2 = 0

range

10.1.4.5 - 10.1.4.7


3)
Given
ip : 192.0.2.3 
subnet mask: 255.255.224.0

11000000.00000000.00000010.00000011 --> Ip address
11111111.11111111.11111110.00000000 --> Subnet Mask

11000000.00000000.0000001 0.00001000 -->Network Address
11000000.00000000.0000001 1.11111111 -->Broadcast Address

no of avaliable address = 2^9 -2 = 512-2 = 510

range

192.0.2.1 - 192.0.0.254
